title: What are the county/state ordinances for keeping backyard chickens in residential areas that are OUTSIDE the city? (Murrayville/Ogden)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/06/what-are-the-ordinances-for-keeping-backyard-chickens-in-new-hanover-county-outside-the-city-of-wilmington/
